body:
Tweet: https://twitter.com/shadowolfYT/status/810939636830715904
Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RmZnN6aA048&feature=youtu.be

To enter this giveaway go like the video, comment down below like a message or something and include your Twitter @ as well. Subscribe to my YouTube channel and click the bell icon to receive notifications when I’m streaming upload and follow me on Twitter @shadowolfyt! You have to be followed on Twitter because that is where I am going to announce the winner and also giving the login details to the winner.

I made a post about this on Twitter you can also go to the post and retweet the heck out of it and get it popular and share it to your friends and if you do like my content and what I do feel free to look around my channel have a watch I make pretty good content… I think...


Good luck to you all in the endeavors of this give away this giveaway will end on the 26th of December good luck!

replies.body: idk... I don't like "sub4money" giveaways. Especially the "and click the bell icon to receive notifications"-part. You should rather have requirements like: "Watch my recent video and give me feedback about it in 5 sentences to participate" or "Suggest 2 new video formats you would like to see" etc..

replies.body:
"sub4money"
At what point is this sub for money?

Technically, you can get something which costs money for free with subbing

"You should rather have requirements like: "Watch my recent video and give me feedback about it in 5 sentences to participate" or "Suggest 2 new video formats you would like to see" etc.."
I kind of want requirements that can promote my channel

Your channel will get promotion by itself if the content is good, but I understand that you want "more" than just that, I just don't like the giveaway way.

replies.body:
Most youtubers do that to get more money, so they can get the prize itself; someone has to pay for the item they are giving away, otherwise, if they cannot get the prize, then they can't do the giveaway since they don't have the money. The higher your sub count, the more people will be attracted to your channel due to the amount of subs and people will think that the youtuber has quality content.

Anyways, on topic:

I will be entering later today or tomorrow.
